channel.title: Ip problem
channel.description: ok i have several problems with my ip. Ok when im portfowarding what ip do i use after i have logged into my router. My computers pc?(aka has the same ip as my router number thingy but last numbers are diffrent.) Also when im running the duc (no-ip) It saying its useing my external ip as the connection so before i make the files for others to download I put the no-ip into all the ip slots on the files or the external (the one the duc saying its useing?) Or do i change the duc somehow to use the same ip i used to porford (aka my computers ip). and after i make the files i change all the ip's to 0.0.0.0 so i can play with the same people correct? And on runelocus what ip to i put as i tried with my no-ip but it said that my server appears to have no connection so i couldnt make the vote page. Also i changed the cache i got at first so i made it into a .rar file and used uppit to get a link for it. I then delete the old cache in the c drive and replace it with the new one (download it) and then go into all the files and change the cache's link and name correct? before making the server into a download file for others. ANd then they just download the same cache i just downloaded(new one) and the client too both in .rar but they extract cache to c drive and client were ever. And then thats all I do correct? Server works for me to get on but idk if it works for others as i cant make the vote page because runelocus is saying its not working.. HHEELLPP please :(

nvrmind i put wrong / in

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

I think that will be in your client.java. Search for cacheMaps and edit accordingly. If you can’t figure it out then you can just rename the cache to “Psychotoxic cache” and change the return = “./cache”; to return = “./Psychotoxic cache”;

I guess the rename wasn’t necessary, just a habit I have when I rename my caches.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @HIGHK9 HIGHK9
item.description:
@HIGHK9 wrote:

I got this after i compiled and tryed to start up server.
I renamed the cache to “cache” and put it in the clients folder

Psychotoxic is loading…
java.io.FileNotFoundException: .\cacheMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find
the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

[quote=“HIGHK9, post:6, topic:442503”]So i need to portford my external ip not my pc’s ip correct? Cause that might be what i did wrong.
This is my whole signlink code what part do i delete and replace with that part? thanks[/quote]
Yes, portforward your external IP including port 43594.

Here, I already fixed it for you:

package sign;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.io.*;
import java.net.*;

 public final class signlink
    implements Runnable
{
    public static void startpriv(InetAddress inetaddress)
    {
        threadliveid = (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D);
        if(active)
        {
            try
            {
                Thread.sleep(500L);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }
            active = false;
        }
        socketreq = 0;
        threadreq = null;
        dnsreq = null;
        savereq = null;
        urlreq = null;
        socketip = inetaddress;
        Thread thread = new Thread(new signlink());
        thread.setDaemon(true);
        thread.start();
        while(!active)
            try
            {
                Thread.sleep(50L);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }
    }

    public void run()
    {
        active = true;
        String s = findcachedir();
        uid = getuid(s);
        try
        {
            File file = new File(s + "main_file_cache.dat");
            if(file.exists() && file.length() > 0x3200000L)
                file.delete();
            cache_dat = new RandomAccessFile(s + "main_file_cache.dat", "rw");
            for(int j = 0; j < 5; j++)
                cache_idx[j] = new RandomAccessFile(s + "main_file_cache.idx" + j, "rw");

        }
        catch(Exception exception)
        {
            exception.printStackTrace();
        }
        for(int i = threadliveid; threadliveid == i;)
        {
            if(socketreq != 0)
            {
                try
                {
                    socket = new Socket(socketip, socketreq);
                }
                catch(Exception _ex)
                {
                    socket = null;
                }
                socketreq = 0;
            } else
            if(threadreq != null)
            {
                Thread thread = new Thread(threadreq);
                thread.setDaemon(true);
                thread.start();
                thread.setPriority(threadreqpri);
                threadreq = null;
            } else
            if(dnsreq != null)
            {
                try
                {
                    dns = InetAddress.getByName(dnsreq).getHostName();
                }
                catch(Exception _ex)
                {
                    dns = "unknown";
                }
                dnsreq = null;
            } else
            if(savereq != null)
            {
                if(savebuf != null)
                    try
                    {
                        FileOutputStream fileoutputstream = new FileOutputStream(s + savereq);
                        fileoutputstream.write(savebuf, 0, savelen);
                        fileoutputstream.close();
                    }
                    catch(Exception _ex) { }
                if(waveplay)
                {
                    String wave = s + savereq;
                    waveplay = false;
                }
                if(midiplay)
                {
                    midi = s + savereq;
                    midiplay = false;
                }
                savereq = null;
            } else
            if(urlreq != null)
            {
                try
                {
                    System.out.println("urlstream");
                    urlstream = new DataInputStream((new URL(mainapp.getCodeBase(), urlreq)).openStream());
                }
                catch(Exception _ex)
                {
                    urlstream = null;
                }
                urlreq = null;
            }
            try
            {
                Thread.sleep(50L);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }
        }

    }

    

    public static String findcachedir() {
        return "./cache";
    }
	public static String sencondDir() {
		File file = new File("./");
		if (!file.exists())
			file.mkdir();
		return file.toString();
	}

    private static int getuid(String s) {
        return 234523;
    }

    public static synchronized Socket opensocket(int i)
        throws IOException
    {
        for(socketreq = i; socketreq != 0;)
            try
            {
                Thread.sleep(50L);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }

        if(socket == null)
            throw new IOException("could not open socket");
        else
            return socket;
    }

    public static synchronized DataInputStream openurl(String s)
        throws IOException
    {
        for(urlreq = s; urlreq != null;)
            try
            {
                Thread.sleep(50L);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex) { }

        if(urlstream == null)
            throw new IOException("could not open: " + s);
        else
            return urlstream;
    }

    public static synchronized void dnslookup(String s)
    {
        dns = s;
        dnsreq = s;
    }

    public static synchronized void startthread(Runnable runnable, int i)
    {
        threadreqpri = i;
        threadreq = runnable;
    }

    public static synchronized boolean wavesave(byte abyte0[], int i)
    {
        if(i > 0x1e8480)
            return false;
        if(savereq != null)
        {
            return false;
        } else
        {
            wavepos = (wavepos + 1) % 5;
            savelen = i;
            savebuf = abyte0;
            waveplay = true;
            savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav";
            return true;
        }
    }

    public static synchronized boolean wavereplay()
    {
        if(savereq != null)
        {
            return false;
        } else
        {
            savebuf = null;
            waveplay = true;
            savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav";
            return true;
        }
    }

    public static synchronized void midisave(byte abyte0[], int i)
    {
        if(i > 0x1e8480)
            return;
        if(savereq != null)
        {
        } else
        {
            midipos = (midipos + 1) % 5;
            savelen = i;
            savebuf = abyte0;
            midiplay = true;
            savereq = "jingle" + midipos + ".mid";
        }
    }

    public static void reporterror(String s)
    {
        System.out.println("Error: " + s);
    }

    private signlink()
    {
    }

    public static final int clientversion = 317;
    public static int uid;
    public static int storeid = 32;
    public static RandomAccessFile cache_dat = null;
    public static final RandomAccessFile[] cache_idx = new RandomAccessFile[5];
    public static boolean sunjava;
    public static Applet mainapp = null;
    private static boolean active;
    private static int threadliveid;
    private static InetAddress socketip;
    private static int socketreq;
    private static Socket socket = null;
    private static int threadreqpri = 1;
    private static Runnable threadreq = null;
    private static String dnsreq = null;
    public static String dns = null;
    private static String urlreq = null;
    private static DataInputStream urlstream = null;
    private static int savelen;
    private static String savereq = null;
    private static byte[] savebuf = null;
    private static boolean midiplay;
    private static int midipos;
    public static String midi = null;
    public static int midivol;
    public static int midifade;
    private static boolean waveplay;
    private static int wavepos;
    public static int wavevol;
    public static boolean reporterror = true;
    public static String errorname = "";

}

Read full topic

item.description:
@HIGHK9 wrote:

So i need to portford my external ip not my pc’s ip correct? Cause that might be what i did wrong.
This is my whole signlink code what part do i delete and replace with that part? thanks

[code=cpp]package sign;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.io.;
import java.net.;

public final class signlink
implements Runnable
{
public static void startpriv(InetAddress inetaddress)
{
threadliveid = (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D);
if(active)
{
try
{
Thread.sleep(500L);
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
active = false;
}
socketreq = 0;
threadreq = null;
dnsreq = null;
savereq = null;
urlreq = null;
socketip = inetaddress;

thread.setDaemon(true);
thread.start();
while(!active)
try
{
Thread.sleep(50L);
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
}

public void run()
{

    uid = getuid(s);
    try
    {
        File file = new File(s + "main_file_cache.dat");
        if(file.exists() && file.length() > 0x3200000L)
            file.delete();
        cache_dat = new RandomAccessFile(s + "main_file_cache.dat", "rw");

    }
    catch(Exception exception)
    {
        exception.printStackTrace();
    }
    for(int i = threadliveid; threadliveid == i;)
    {
        if(socketreq != 0)
        {

            {
                socket = new Socket(socketip, socketreq);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                socket = null;

            socketreq = 0;
        } else
        if(threadreq != null)
        {
            Thread thread = new Thread(threadreq);
            thread.setDaemon(true);
            thread.start();
            thread.setPriority(threadreqpri);
            threadreq = null;
        } else

            {
                dns = "unknown";
            }
            dnsreq = null;
        } else
        if(savereq != null)
        {
            if(savebuf != null)
                try
                {
                    FileOutputStream fileoutputstream = new FileOutputStream(s + savereq);
                    fileoutputstream.write(savebuf, 0, savelen);
                    fileoutputstream.close();
                }
                catch(Exception _ex) { }
            if(waveplay)
            {
                String wave = s + savereq;
                waveplay = false;
            }
            if(midiplay)
            {
                midi = s + savereq;
                midiplay = false;
            }
            savereq = null;
        } else
        if(urlreq != null)
        {
            try
            {
                System.out.println("urlstream");
                urlstream = new DataInputStream((new URL(mainapp.getCodeBase(), urlreq)).openStream());
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                urlstream = null;
            }
            urlreq = null;
        }
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
    }

}



public static String findcachedir() {
    String as[] = {"C:/"};
    if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34)
        storeid = 32;
    String s = "public static String findcachedir() {
    String as[] = {"C:/"};
    if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34)
        storeid = 32;
    String s = "Psychotoxic cache";
    for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++)
        try {
            String s1 = as[i];
            if(s1.length() > 0) {
                File file = new File(s1);
                if(!file.exists())
                    continue;
            }
            File file1 = new File(s1 + s);
            if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir())
                return s1 + s + "/";
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
    return null;
}";
    for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++)
        try {
            String s1 = as[i];
            if(s1.length() > 0) {
                File file = new File(s1);
                if(!file.exists())
                    continue;
            }
            File file1 = new File(s1 + s);
            if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir())
                return s1 + s + "/";
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
    return null;
}


public static String sencondDir() {
	File file = new File("./");
	if (!file.exists())
		file.mkdir();
	return file.toString();
}

private static int getuid(String s) {
    return 234523;
}

public static synchronized Socket opensocket(int i)
    throws IOException
{
    for(socketreq = i; socketreq != 0;)
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }

    if(socket == null)
        throw new IOException("could not open socket");
    else
        return socket;
}

public static synchronized DataInputStream openurl(String s)
    throws IOException
{
    for(urlreq = s; urlreq != null;)
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }

    if(urlstream == null)
        throw new IOException("could not open: " + s);
    else
        return urlstream;
}

public static synchronized void dnslookup(String s)
{
    dns = s;
    dnsreq = s;
}

public static synchronized void startthread(Runnable runnable, int i)
{
    threadreqpri = i;
    threadreq = runnable;
}

public static synchronized boolean wavesave(byte abyte0[], int i)
{
    if(i > 0x1e8480)
        return false;
    if(savereq != null)
    {
        return false;
    } else
    {
        wavepos = (wavepos + 1) % 5;
        savelen = i;
        savebuf = abyte0;
        waveplay = true;
        savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav";
        return true;
    }
}

public static synchronized boolean wavereplay()
{
    if(savereq != null)
    {
        return false;
    } else
    {
        savebuf = null;
        waveplay = true;
        savereq = "sound" + wavepos + ".wav";
        return true;
    }
}

public static synchronized void midisave(byte abyte0[], int i)
{
    if(i > 0x1e8480)
        return;
    if(savereq != null)
    {
    } else
    {
        midipos = (midipos + 1) % 5;
        savelen = i;
        savebuf = abyte0;
        midiplay = true;
        savereq = "jingle" + midipos + ".mid";
    }
}

public static void reporterror(String s)
{
    System.out.println("Error: " + s);
}

private signlink()
{
}

public static final int clientversion = 317;
public static int uid;
public static int storeid = 32;
public static RandomAccessFile cache_dat = null;
public static final RandomAccessFile[] cache_idx = new RandomAccessFile[5];
public static boolean sunjava;

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

No-ip masks your external IP (the ip that is similar to 66.249.73.5). Players would only need to type the no-ip adress into their client in order to connect HOWEVER, you would need to have the 43594 port open before they could connect. Doing so depends on what router you have, but if you need help with portforwarding, look here: http://www.portforward.com

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

To be honest, I have never port-forwarded, but the players will be connecting to you via your global IP which is masked by no-ip.org, so you only need to port-forward your global IP. You’ll have an IP beginning with either 10., 172. or 192., and this is your local IP so don’t worry about that one. The one similar to “78.182.2.17” is your global IP.

Replace your entire findCache method with:

public static String findcachedir() {
        return "./cache";
    }

then move your “Psychotoxic cache” from your C:/ folder to your client folder (in the same folder as all your files) and rename “Psychotoxic cache” to “cache”. Then, you can just .rar your entire client and give it to whoever you like.

This way they don’t need to download a cache and fiddle around with it.

Once you think you’re done, send me a link via pm and I’ll test it for you (don’t forget to change the IP).

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @HIGHK9 HIGHK9
item.description:
@HIGHK9 wrote:

Ok, and the no-ip thingy that you have on the hoster’s page theres your ip on it too (not the no-ip) lets say its 1.1.1.1 does it matter that the ip i portforded in my router is 2.2.2.2(my pc’s ip it says) and 1.1.1.1 is my external ip when i google.

Also, my ip on the no-ip is 1.1.1.1 (my external ip) So was I supposed to port it or what so lost on this lol

And cache

public static String findcachedir() {
String as[] = {“C:/”};
if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34)
storeid = 32;
String s = “[size=14pt]Psychotoxic cache[/size]”;
for(int i = 0; i < as.length; i++)
try {
String s1 = as[i];
if(s1.length() > 0) {
File file = new File(s1);
if(!file.exists())
continue;
}
File file1 = new File(s1 + s);
if(file1.exists() || file1.mkdir())
return s1 + s + “/”;
}
catch(Exception _ex) { }
return null;
}
Thats what my cache in my sunlink folder is and htats the name of the cache i made. Like it said it works for me so i think its correct. Is it ok for me to make that cache into a .rar file so i can upload it to uppit and make it to a url for htem to download. WOuld it still work if i did that. Thanks for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Ip problem
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

For your cache, you should just make it load from the client folder. Rename your cache to just “cache” and then navigate to your Signlink.java in your client folder.

Post your entire “findCacheDir()” method.

As for your IP, I’m not sure I quite understood, but I’ll just say 0.0.0.0 is your localhost, meaning only you can connect using that IP. For other players to connect they need the client with the “myservername.no-ip.biz” in place of your “0.0.0.0”.

Read full topic
